19411.description: Plugin para facilitar a cria√ß√£o de trackings

19334.description:
Create a document on Figma using the Markdown.

  • Heading ‚úî

19287.name: Tabletop Tools
19287.description: A small set of tools to help tabletop games designers prototyping new ideas!

19170.name: Aco Reader
19170.description: Sometimes you need to reuse your prebuild color palette with extension ACO(.aco) that you've on your another APP, but currently on Figma doesn't provide this thing. This plugin provide you to easily convert .aco file to color palette.

19152.name: Topo
19152.description:
Review and report instances and components from Figma.


Topo is a Figma Plugin that will allow you report and comment on specific components and post it to any Slack channel or endpoint you want.


You can try Topo for free for up to 3 component reports. Once you buy a license you're entitled to a lifetime license key and updates, while supporting and contributing to build better features and more plugins and tools.


Get lifetime license


General usage:

  • Add Topo integration for Slack
  • With Topo opened, select an Instance or Component you want to review or report in your Figma file.
  • Hit 'Report'.
  • Check the Slack channel and keep track of what's being reported and resolved.


Crafted for design system and library management teams

Allow everyone to report component errors, bugs or issues in a single channel, integrated with the tools you use everyday. Keep track of what‚Äôs being resolved.


No need to stop designing

Stop jumping into calls and sending messages that get lost in the discussion. Report without leaving Figma.


Connect your own endpoint for integration with other tools

If you don‚Äôt want to use the default Slack app, you can send the reported data to any custom endpoint. Maybe your own API to create JIRA tickets?

19136.name: Line Height
19136.description:
Line Height is a free plugin to perfectly calculated line height of your text! Get your line height game on point. 


Optimize the line height of your typography with the Golden Ratio for aesthetically pleasing text. üéâ


How to:

‚Äî Select one or multiple text elements

‚Äî Run the plugin

‚Äî Have aesthetically pleasing text üéâ


Customer support:

support@oneblinq.com

19057.name: Non Boring Gradients
19057.description:
Have you heard about interpolation spaces ? They affect how gradient goes from one color to another.

It always been with sRGB interpolation, and linear*. Till now.*

It's time to discover HSL, HWB and LCH interpolation spaces ü¶Ñ And what about a sweet Ease In Cubic curve too?


Come and give a new dimension to your designs ‚úåü§ô‚ö°

Your gradient will never be boring anymore ü•≥

19051.name: Straple Text Style Manager
19051.description: Text style manager allows you to update your global text styles all at once rather than individually, so if you have any type hierarchy then you no longer need to update each font individually.

18944.name: Contrast Grid
18944.description:
Contrast Grid plugin is Inspired by Eightshapes Contrast Grid.


Check contrast multiple foreground and background color combos for compliance with WCAG 2.1 minimum contrast.


Include one color per line, with an optional comma-separated alpha value.

19127.name: Wantedly Preflight
19127.description:
Wantedly Preflight is a Figma plugin that validates your project satisfies the rules of the design system of Wantedly.


Features

  •  Validation ‚Äï You can check whether the node is valid just by running the plugin. The result will come out with a detailed message and you can jump into fixing it immediately with a focus button.
  •  Configurable ‚Äï Wantedly Preflight has 6+ sophisticated rule and all of them are well-tested. However, in case if you would like to opt-out of some of the rule in your project, you can independently configure items to enable.
  •  Ignore ‚Äï Exceptions are always there. On the result page, you have a check button to ignore the specific node. After you ignored a node, it will always be considered appropriate regardless of whether it violates our rules or not.


Our Design System

See Wantedly UI Components

19448.name: Figtag
19448.description:
Create your tags as a variant component and apply them as tags to your frames.


Top features:

Apply tags to multiple frames

Filter tagged frames

No need to run the plugin for change tag; just change the first property of the tag instance (the plugin uses it as the status)

Auto delete tag on frame remove

Live tag position based on frame position

19254.name: Aks - LTR to RTL
19254.description:
Are you tired of dealing with two different versions (RTL and LTR) of your design at the same time? we have got your back! with Aks you can easily assign the translation to the text and convert the whole layout from LTR to RTL with one click!


The tool is specially designed for Urdu, Arabic, Persian, and other RTL languages.


Get your job done in three simple steps:


  1. Select the text and assign font and translation.
  2. Select and mark "Do not flip" to non-symmetrical elements.
  3. Select the main frame, and simply click the "Convert" button.


We promise it is as easy as it sounds :)

19156.name: Toukan
19156.description:
A simple and intuitive tool to generate design tokens based on Figma design system in one click.


Copy and use this page from community file as boiler plate:

https://www.figma.com/file/aZL0Y2Xy2gZKpMFtbhqvjU/Toukan?node-id=0%3A1


Don't forget to give your feedback! :)

18954.description:

19107.name: Image Extractor
19107.description: Find all images in a file and extract the original files in a zipped folder. Useful to re-gain access to images you pasted in figma directly or lost the source file.
